name: Axolotl Runs
description:
WASD to move!

This is a very short and simple game made by my son and I. Play as his pet axolotl Axer as he eats tiny shrimp! Eating shrimp earns you points and help you grow.

No game ending. We only spent a few hours on this, and this is his first game so nice comments are greatly appreciated! <3
